name: headlight
content:

a large, powerful light at the front of a vehicle, usually one of two: I could see a car's headlights coming towards me.headlights on It was foggy, and all the cars had their headlights on.dip your headlights No one dips their headlights (= makes them shine downwards) here, so you're constantly dazzled.
